title: Isabel Wilkerson Talks About Michelle Obama’s Memoir
description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning historian discusses the former first lady’s story, and Helen Schulman talks about her novel “Come With Me.”
author: books@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
content:encoded: The Pulitzer Prize-winning historian discusses the former first lady’s story, and Helen Schulman talks about her novel “Come With Me.”
